about.title: About
about.quote: "Don't wear anything on your head other than a hat."
about.p1: I'm an active game developer working with Unity(6 years+), Godot(2y+) and Unreal Engine(1y), creating immersive and engaging gameplay experiences. As the president of a large game development community, I enjoy bringing people together, leading projects, and empowering others to grow. I believe strong leadership starts with empathy, clear communication, and a shared vision.
about.p2: In addition to game development, I work on VR projects focused on healthcare and simulation bridging technology and well-being through innovative design.
